sentences.en: A deep - rooted tree is leafy ; an ambitious man is vigorous.
sentences.cn: 根深 叶才茂,志壮干劲高.

sentences.en: Alfred was intensely ambitious, obsessed with the idea of becoming rich.
sentences.cn: 艾尔弗雷德雄心勃勃，一心想着发财。

sentences.en: Chris is so ambitious, so determined to do it all.
sentences.cn: 克里斯踌躇满志，决心要将它都做完。

sentences.en: He has always been ambitious and fiercely competitive.
sentences.cn: 他一直都雄心勃勃，而且极其好胜。

sentences.en: He is ambitious and susceptible to flattery.
sentences.cn: 他雄心勃勃，而且很喜欢听别人的恭维话。

sentences.en: He is an ambitious young man full of enthusiasm and vitality.
sentences.cn: 他是个充满热情与活力的有远大抱负的青年.

sentences.en: He was by his own account an ambitious workaholic.
sentences.cn: 据他自己所言，他是个雄心勃勃的工作狂。

sentences.en: Her parents were intensely ambitious for her and her younger sister.
sentences.cn: 她的父母对她和她妹妹有着很高的期望.

sentences.en: Marcus was handsome, dynamic and ambitious.
sentences.cn: 马库斯仪表堂堂，精力充沛且雄心勃勃。

sentences.en: One may be poor but never ceases to be ambitious.
Only ambitious students get the best marks.
sentences.cn: 有抱负的学生才能取得最好的成绩.

sentences.en: The actress is ambitious of applause.
sentences.cn: 这女演员极想得到喝彩.

sentences.en: This is an ambitious and intriguing movie, full of striking imagery.
sentences.cn: 这是一部气势恢宏、引人入胜的电影，充满了动人心魄的瑰丽意象。
年轻人, 要胸怀大志.

words.tran_cn: 雄心勃勃地；劲头十足地；热切地

trans.tran_cn: 有野心的，有雄心的，规模宏大的，艰巨的
trans.tran_en: determined to be successful, rich, powerful etc
